subject: Re: Urgent - Order #SSN2836 Dispatch Confirmation?
description_text:
Hi Team,

Thank you for getting back to me. I am concerned that only one of my packages has arrived so far (the VAM Pro Linear Motor). I am still waiting for the Plus X pedals to arrive.

Are you able to assist me as we are well past the 10 days max arrival time for express shipping.

Thank you.
Ryan

________________________________
From: service@simsonn.com <service@simsonn.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 9, 2025 6:21 PM
To: ryanharriswork@hotmail.com <ryanharriswork@hotmail.com>
Subject: Re: Urgent - Order #SSN2836 Dispatch Confirmation?

Hi Ryan Harris,

We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:
https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959667113




On Thu, 9 Oct at 1:09 AM , Ryan Harris <ryanharriswork@hotmail.com> wrote:
Hi team,

I placed an order (#SSN2836) on the 4th of October and paid for express shipping.

Unfortunately, I haven't received a confirmation of dispatch?

Can you please confirm you've received the order and the express shipping terms will be met?

Thank you!
Ryan Harris


________________________________

conversations.body_text: Hi Ryan Harris,    The logistics tracking is currently updating normally, with delivery expected around the 22nd. We sincerely apologise for the delay, which appears to have been caused by the excessive volume of goods handled by the Chinese logistics company on the 9th following the eight-day holiday period.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959667113

Hi team,

Thank you for this update. I am very concerned that my pedals have not arrived yet. The tracking link shows them to be Sydney (in transit - not even out for delivery) for over 4 days now.

Can you please enquire into why my express shipment is taking so long.

I will be requesting a refund on the express shipping amount as I ordered on the 4th of October - without any warning of eight-day holidays or expected delays.

Thank you.
Ryan


________________________________
Hi Ryan Harris,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We have refunded the extra shipping charges for you. Your package is expected to arrive shortly.
